English:

Title: Michael Jackson: The life of an idoc
Original title: Michael Jackson: The Life of an Icon
Country: USA
Length: 120 Mins
Genre: Documentary, Biography, Music
Blu-ray release: 09/11/2011
Director: Andrew Eastel
Starring: Michael Jackson Documentary

Synopsis:
---------
"Michael Jackson: The Life of an Idol" shows the singer's life behind the scenes, from childhood with the Jackson 5, to his consecration as a soloist in the world and remembering the moments before his sudden death in 2009. Directed by Andrew Eastel and produced by a close friend of the childhood of Michael Jackson, David Gest, "Michael Jackson: The Life of an idol" to Katherine Jackson is the first opportunity to offer his version of the story about his son, his childhood Gary, his hometown, his support during the trials he faced Michael, and how they came forward after these chapters. Rebbie Jackson, Michael's older sister, offers an unprecedented interview and also reviews the artist's childhood, her difficult relationship with his father Joe, such a close union between him and his mother and the decline of the star during recent years. Meanwhile, Tito, another brother, recounts in detail the career of Michael and how his mother and family in general went through the judicial process in 2005. "Michael Jackson: Life of an idol" also includes previously unreleased material recorded in studio and live television appearances, both Michael Jackson and the Jackson 5.
